text: Cabin Boy is a 1994 fantasy comedy movie directed by Adam Resnick and co- produced by Tim Burton, which starred comedian Chris Elliott. Elliott co-wrote the movie with Resnick. Both men worked for Late Night with David Letterman in the 1980s, as well as co-creating the short-lived FOX sitcom Get a Life in the early 1990s. The project was originally to be directed by Tim Burton, who had contacted Chris Elliott after seeing Get a Life. Resnick took over after Burton was offered the movie Ed Wood. ==Cast== *Chris Elliott as Nathaniel Mayweather *Andy Richter as Kenny *Albert Brooks as Old Salt In Fishing Village *Mike Starr as Mulligan the Giant *Jim Cummings as the Floating Cupcake (voice) *Brion James as Big Teddy *Brian Doyle-Murray as Skunk *James Gammon as Paps *Ritch Brinkley as Captain Greybar *Melora Walters as Trina *Bob Elliott as William Mayweather ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1994 movies Category:American movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about giants
title: Cabin Boy
